settings.custom_liquid:
Our mission is to provide luxury accommodations for our corporate clients.

Our corporate clients are typically business professionals, travel nurses, & remote workers.

1. We sign a lease with you

2. We furnish the property.

3. We pay you regular monthly rent.

4. We provide accommodations to our vetted corporate clients coming into town.

5. After every guest, the property is cleaned to the highest standard by a professional cleaning company. We also take care of any light maintenance.  

1. Criminal Background Screening

2. Comprehensive Rental Agreement

3. Preventative Security Systems 

Every guest must pass a background check, sign a rental agreement, fill out a questionnaire and provide ID.

We vet our guests carefully using this information and reserve the right to cancel any stay that flags our system.

Regarding our regular corporate clients, these guests are already verified and our corporate client is held liable for the guest.

Comprehensive Rental Agreement

The primary guest on all Esocidae reservations must legally sign off on our agreement. The guest’s signature is legally binding with timestamps and IP address.

Upon making a reservation Esocidae automatically sends an email requiring the guest to verify their identity and submit their information for a criminal background screen.

The link provided takes them to Esocidae's criminal screening tool, TransUnion Smart Move.

The guest is asked for their full legal name, previous address, social security number, and date of birth.

A criminal background report is sent securely to Esocidae where our Trust & Safety Manager analyzes the results and makes a decision based on Esocidae’s screening policy.

We do not accept severe criminal convictions and sex offenses including but not limited to murder, terrorism, rape, assault, battery and child abuse.

Our screening checks the OFAC list and public state and country criminal records as well as state and national sex offender registries.

For lesser charges, Esocidae’s screening policy takes several factors into account, such as the severity of the charge, when the charge was placed, and the type of offense.

1. Ring Camera for Front Door Surveillance

This protocol allows Esocidae’s Trust and Safety Manager to enforce occupancy, arms, and behavioral rules.

2. Smart Lock for Access Security

This protocol controls access to any Esocidae unit by providing guests with a one-time code only valid for the duration of their reservation. A separate unique code and the key is given to our Partners

3. Noise and Smoke Monitor 

We install a noise and smoke monitor which allows Esocidae’s Trust and Safety Manager to enforce smoking and noise rules.
